title: Portfolio | Web & Agentic AI Developer - Hasnain Ahmed
description: Welcome to Hasnain Ahmed's portfolio. I am a Web & Agentic AI Developer specializing in TypeScript, Next.js, Python and Sanity.io. Explore my featured projects, skills, and testimonials.
content_snippet: This is the home page of Hasnain Ahmed, showcasing an introduction, featured projects in modern web technologies, an overview of key frontend and backend skills, testimonials from satisfied clients, and a call to action.

title: Projects | Hasnain Ahmed's Developer Portfolio
description: Explore Hasnain Ahmed's diverse projects showcasing his skills in TypeScript, Next.js, Python, and more, including web applications, CLI tools, and AI solutions.
content_snippet: A grid of various projects developed by Hasnain Ahmed. Each project highlights different technologies and problem-solving approaches, with links to detailed case studies or live demos. Technologies used include TypeScript, Next.js, Python, Sanity.io, Stripe, and ShipEngine.

title: E-commerce Platform with Next.js and Stripe
description: A full-stack e-commerce solution leveraging Next.js for the frontend, Sanity.io for content management, and Stripe for payment processing, developed by Hasnain Ahmed.
content_snippet: Hasnain Ahmed developed a scalable e-commerce platform with features like product listings, shopping cart, user authentication, and secure checkout, focusing on performance and user experience.

title: Personal Developer Portfolio Site v1
description: This is Hasnain Ahmed's personal developer portfolio site, showcasing projects, skills, and expertise built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
content_snippet: Hasnain Ahmed's portfolio site features responsive design, dark/light mode, custom animations, and integrated Algolia search, reflecting his front-end development capabilities.

title: Interactive Data Dashboard with Streamlit and Python
description: Hasnain Ahmed developed an interactive web dashboard for data visualization and analysis using Streamlit, powered by Python.
content_snippet: This project by Hasnain Ahmed demonstrates dynamic charts, real-time data updates, user input forms, and data filtering capabilities within a scalable backend built with Streamlit and Python.

title: Case Studies | Hasnain Ahmed's Work
description: In-depth analysis of selected projects by Hasnain Ahmed, detailing the challenges, solutions, and outcomes.
content_snippet: A collection of detailed case studies from Hasnain Ahmed's portfolio, each explaining project goals, the development process, technologies used, and the results achieved through his expertise.

title: E-commerce Platform from Figma to Full Deployment
description: A comprehensive case study by Hasnain Ahmed on transforming UI/UX Figma designs into a fully functional e-commerce platform, covering frontend, backend, and payment integration.
content_snippet: Hasnain Ahmed successfully delivered a scalable e-commerce solution with enhanced user experience, robust payment processing, and efficient content management, leading to improved conversion rates from initial design mockups.

title: Innovative Resume Builder - A Hackathon Success Story by Hasnain Ahmed
description: Detailing the development process and key innovations behind a resume builder application created by Hasnain Ahmed during a 5-project hackathon.
content_snippet: Hasnain Ahmed developed a feature-rich resume builder with PDF export and customizable templates, demonstrating rapid prototyping and effective teamwork under time constraints during a challenging hackathon.

title: Comprehensive Python OOP Project by Hasnain Ahmed with 21 Assignments
description: An in-depth look at a large-scale Python Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) project by Hasnain Ahmed, integrating 21 practical assignments into a single cohesive application.
content_snippet: Hasnain Ahmed demonstrated mastery of advanced OOP principles in this project, creating highly modular and reusable code, and successfully implementing complex functionalities through practical application of 21 assignments.

title: TypeScript CLI Tools for Developer Workflow Automation by Hasnain Ahmed
description: A case study on designing and implementing a suite of command-line interface (CLI) tools using TypeScript by Hasnain Ahmed to streamline common development tasks.
content_snippet: Hasnain Ahmed developed robust and efficient CLI tools that automated repetitive tasks, significantly improving development workflow and reducing manual errors for internal processes using TypeScript.

title: Services | Hasnain Ahmed's Developer Portfolio
description: Hasnain Ahmed offers professional web development services including frontend, backend, and full-stack solutions, alongside Agentic AI development.
content_snippet: Explore the comprehensive services offered by Hasnain Ahmed: Frontend Development (React, Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS), Backend Development (Python, Node.js, API design), Full-Stack Solutions, Agentic AI Development, Sanity.io integration, E-commerce solutions, and Performance Optimization.

description: Hasnain Ahmed crafts responsive and performant user interfaces with modern technologies like Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
content_snippet: Hasnain Ahmed specializes in creating beautiful and intuitive user experiences. His expertise covers the React ecosystem, state management, and building accessible web applications.

title: Building Performant Next.js Applications
author: Hasnain Ahmed
content_snippet: Hasnain Ahmed's guide to optimizing Next.js applications for speed and user experience, covering image optimization, code splitting, SSR, and SSG. Performance is a critical aspect of user experience, influencing user retention and search engine rankings.

title: Getting Started with Agentic AI in Python
author: Hasnain Ahmed
content_snippet: Hasnain Ahmed's beginner's guide to understanding and building your first intelligent agents using Python and key AI frameworks. This article introduces core concepts and demonstrates how to create simple AI-driven applications.

author: Hasnain Ahmed
